title: State of Food and Agriculture (SOFA) 2020 :  Overcoming Water Challenges in Agriculture

tasks.task: Understand the importance of water in agriculture and its current challenges.
subtasks: Recognize water as a key resource for life and civilization.
Acknowledge agriculture's heavy reliance on water (70% of global withdrawals).
Note the decline in freshwater resources and population growth's impact on water scarcity.
Understand socioeconomic development's role in increasing water demands and dietary shifts.
Recognize climate change and competition's effects on water access.
Identify vulnerable populations' susceptibility to water-related issues.

tasks.task: Identify strategies for sustainable water resource management.
subtasks: Promote environmental flow requirements for ecosystems.
Encourage water harvesting and conservation techniques in rain-fed agriculture.
Advocate for irrigation system rehabilitation and innovative technology adoption.
Combine improved water management with best agronomic practices.
Support non-consumptive water uses and unconventional sources.
Emphasize the importance of effective policies and governance.
